techmeme.title: UK-based R3, a blockchain tech developer for financial institutions, partners with the Solana Foundation to let R3 customers use the Solana blockchain (Philip Stafford/Financial Times)
Sources: companies co-owned by JPMorgan Chase, BOA, Citigroup, Wells Fargo, and other large commercial banks are exploring whether to issue a joint stablecoin (Wall Street Journal)
Bluesky lets "notable and authentic" accounts apply for blue check verification and enables select organizations to become Trusted Verifiers to verify others (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Valve releases SteamOS 3.7.8, adding support for the Lenovo Legion Go S, a recovery image to install SteamOS on other AMD handhelds like the ROG Ally, and more (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
Meta is testing turning images on some Instagram feeds into 3D photos on the Instagram app for Quest, as well as a new Horizon OS interface called Navigator (David Heaney/UploadVR)
